title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Course Content Nature and types of conflict, sources of conflict, conflict handling styles, resolving conflict through various means especially through effective communication skills; Understanding bargaining, factors affecting bargaining, bargaining styles; Negotiation process, role of collective bargaining and collaboration, developing effective negotiation skills.
